item.title: Lab Notes
item.description: Lab Notes # Lab 3, Due 10/8/2021 23:59 EST Handy Links: https://www.regextester.com/ https://cheatography.com/davechild/cheat-sheets/regular-expressions/ Valid Hashtag is: Start of file: hashtag + whitespace End of file: whitespace + hashtag Everything else: whitespace + hashtag + whitespace Note: Newlines are considered white-space (\n) Example: Line: I can't wait to fail POSt at #UofT! There's just #Too#Many#Proofs! #Boundless\n Hashtags: #UofT!
